text: Sir William Felix Browder, (born 23 April 1964) is an American-born British financier and political activist. He is the CEO and co-founder of Hermitage Capital Management. In 2005, his deportation from Russia became national news. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Profile of Browder, Stanford Business School alumni magazine *Video – Bill Browder: Sergey Magnitsky case reveals Russia's ugliest face, Opalesque FIVE Minutes, 17 February 2010 * "The Browder Ultimatum", Tatler magazine, June 2010 * Video – Interview with Browder, Charlie Rose Show * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:British businesspeople Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Businesspeople from New Jersey Category:American political activists Category:British activists
title: Bill Browder
